content: Hello guys, is there another Dutch FHIR server with more test data? Thank you!
What do you mean when you say "another"? Did you find the Spark server we used for DevDays?
I was testing on http://medmij.furore.com/fhir and there is only one Medication and maybe two MedicationOrders
Hi @Andrei Popa , we are currently moving to STU3 with our profiles, including examples. We will create more examples once our profiles are ready for draft publication
Thank you, please post updates when there is a new endpoint, I want to contribute as well with examples in orthopedics

@Andrei Popa Regardless of a test server: we work here http://github.com/Nictiz/MedMij-STU3 .... so if you feel like contributing orthopedics, which is something I don't think we have covered or planned, please consider what we have and a potentially a pull request. Note that for an example to work properly we might also need the profiles that go with it. Let's stay in touch.
Hi. Is there a MedMij FHIR test server still up and running? I get nothing when trying http://medmij.furore.com/fhir
@Marten Smits @Ardon Toonstra

The server https://vonk.test-nictiz.nl/ acts as a MedMij Test server. It is loaded with all the conformance resources from this Simplifier project: https://simplifier.net/nictizstu3-zib2017 and should have a lot of examples that conform to those resources
Thanks. I'll try that one. But that doesnot answer my question why medmij.furore.com doesnot work...

Thanks. I'll try that one. But that doesnot answer my question why medmij.furore.com doesnot work...

Because it isn't online anymore. One reason, we are not Furore anymore ;) and second, we moved to test server to the Nictiz for obvious reasons.
The medmij.furore.com was a temporary solution for DevDays 2016, it was always our intention to move it to Nictiz
Of course! I forgot a minute about Fire.ly! Sorry for the confusion. Thanks.
